remarks: The polarity of a set of atoms is a projective subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
polsubsp.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
polsubsp.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
polsubsp.p $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
polsubN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) -> ( ._|_ ` X ) e. S ) $.
